mapper.select: SELECT L1.* FROM (SELECT P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,NVL(P1.znzw_Amt,0) znzw_Amt,P2.ZJ_ZNZW_NEW znzw_Amt_Avg_Tar FROM (select S.ZJ_AREA_NAME,count(*) znzw_Amt from XFY_ZNZW_ORDER_DETAIL S LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON Q ON S.ZJ_AREA_NAME=Q.ZJ_NEW where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} group by S.ZJ_AREA_NAME) P1 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET P2 ON P1.ZJ_AREA_NAME=P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME WHERE P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') ORDER BY P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc)L1 UNION ALL select p10.Zj_Name,p10.znzw_Amt,p9.ZJ_ZNZW_NEW znzw_Amt_Avg_Tar from (SELECT '合计' Zj_Name,count(*)znzw_Amt from XFY_ZNZW_ORDER_DETAIL S where s.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} )p10 left join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET p9 ON P10.Zj_Name=P9.ZJ_ABBR_NAME

SELECT L1.* FROM (select p2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,nvl(l1.rh_Amt,0) rh_Amt,NVL(rh_Znzw_Num,0)rh_Znzw_Num, znzw_Rate from (select S2.ZJ_OLD,count(*) rh_Amt,sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)rh_Znzw_Num, CASE WHEN count(*) =0 THEN 0 ELSE sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/count(*) END znzw_Rate from XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET S1 LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON S2 ON S1.BRANCH_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_NEW left join XFY_ZNZW_ORDER_DETAIL S3 ON S3.PROM_INTEG_ID=S1.PROM_INTEG_ID where S2.ZJ_OLD NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') and s1.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s1.cpl_dt <= #{endDate} group by S2.ZJ_OLD)l1 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET P2 ON l1.ZJ_OLD=P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME WHERE P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') ORDER BY P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) L1 UNION ALL select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) rh_Amt,sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)rh_Znzw_Num, CASE WHEN count(*) =0 THEN 0 ELSE sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/count(*) END znzw_Rate from XFY_RPT_RH_ORDER_ASSET S1 LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON S2 ON S1.BRANCH_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_NEW left join XFY_ZNZW_ORDER_DETAIL S3 ON S3.PROM_INTEG_ID=S1.PROM_INTEG_ID where s1.cpl_dt >= #{startDate} and s1.cpl_dt <= #{endDate}

SELECT L1.* FROM (select p2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME Zj_Name,nvl(l1.bb_Amt,0) bb_Amt,NVL(bb_Znzw_Num,0)bb_Znzw_Num, znzw_Rate from (select S2.ZJ_OLD,count(*) bb_Amt,sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)bb_Znzw_Num, CASE WHEN count(*) =0 THEN 0 ELSE sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/count(*) END znzw_Rate from XFY_KD_ASSET S1 LEFT JOIN XFY_REP_PUB_ZJ_CON S2 ON S1.ZJ_AREA_NAME=S2.ZJ_NEW left join XFY_ZNZW_ORDER_DETAIL S3 ON S3.PROM_INTEG_ID=S1.PROM_INTEG_ID inner join XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL S4 ON S4.ASSET_ROW_ID=S1.ASSET_ROW_ID AND S4.CPL_DT>= #{startDate} and S4.CPL_DT <= #{endDate} where S2.ZJ_OLD NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') and s1.SERV_START_DT >= #{startDate} and s1.SERV_START_DT <= #{endDate} and s1.prom_name not like '%完美%联盟%' and s1.prom_name not like '%酒店%联盟%' and s1.CACCT_ID not in ('2742039410352','2742043400287','2742043679717','2742037917799','2742037919610','2742039829735','2742037919567','2742025286104','2742025284266' ,'2742035055805','2742025290416','2741049732135','2741049732180','2741049732096','2741049732132','2741049666670','2741049580116') group by S2.ZJ_OLD)l1 right join XFY_REP_PUB_TARGET P2 ON l1.ZJ_OLD=P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME WHERE P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME NOT IN ('鄞州政企部','合计') ORDER BY P2.ZJ_ABBR_NAME desc) L1 UNION ALL select '合计' Zj_Name,count(*) bb_Amt,sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)bb_Znzw_Num, CASE WHEN count(*) =0 THEN 0 ELSE sum(CASE WHEN S3.ASSET_ROW_ID IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)/count(*) END znzw_Rate from XFY_KD_ASSET S1 left join XFY_ZNZW_ORDER_DETAIL S3 ON S3.PROM_INTEG_ID=S1.PROM_INTEG_ID inner join XFY_RPT_KD_ORDER_DETAIL S4 ON S4.ASSET_ROW_ID=S1.ASSET_ROW_ID AND S4.CPL_DT>= #{startDate} and S4.CPL_DT <= #{endDate} where S4.CPL_DT>= #{startDate} and S4.CPL_DT <= #{endDate} and s1.prom_name not like '%完美%联盟%' and s1.prom_name not like '%酒店%联盟%' and s1.CACCT_ID not in ('2742039410352','2742043400287','2742043679717','2742037917799','2742037919610','2742039829735','2742037919567','2742025286104','2742025284266' ,'2742035055805','2742025290416','2741049732135','2741049732180','2741049732096','2741049732132','2741049666670','2741049580116')
